original_title: Henrietta and Her Dismal Display of Affection
overview: After a lusty sexual affair leaves a family divided and a father devastated, Henrietta ( Alice McAllister ) must do what she can to hold on to what little stability her family has left. Along the way, the family encounters a diverse and colorful cast of burnouts and hippies, deviants and rejects, thrown mercilessly into the mysterious and maddening misfortunes of Reedville, Texas
title: Henrietta and Her Dismal Display of Affection
